an8.16:1.1: “Atthahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu duteyyam gantumarahati.
an8.16:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sota ca hoti, saveta ca, uggaheta ca, dhareta ca, vinnata ca, vinnapeta ca, kusalo ca sahitasahitassa, no ca kalahakarako—
an8.16:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu duteyyam gantumarahati.
an8.16:1.5: Atthahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato sariputto duteyyam gantumarahati.
an8.16:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, sariputto sota ca hoti, saveta ca, uggaheta ca, dhareta ca, vinnata ca, vinnapeta ca, kusalo ca sahitasahitassa, no ca kalahakarako.
an8.16:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi dhammehi samannagato sariputto duteyyam gantumarahatiti.
